con:part.con:content: <definitions name="CustomerESC" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/ESC/Parties/Customer/V1" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:em="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EM/Parties/Customer/V1" xmlns:esc="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/ESC/Parties/Customer/V1"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EM/Parties/Customer/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EM/Parties/Customer/V1/CustomerEM.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="CreateCustomerRequestMessage"> <part name="CreateCustomerRequest" element="em:CreateCustomerRequestEM"/> </message> <message name="CreateCustomerResponseMessage"> <part name="CreateCustomerStatusResponse" element="em:CreateCustomerResponseEM"/> </message> <message name="QueryCustomerRequestMessage"> <part name="QueryCustomerRequest" element="em:QueryCustomerRequestEM"/> </message> <message name="QueryCustomerResponseMessage"> <part name="QueryCustomerResponse" element="em:QueryCustomerResponseEM"/> </message> <message name="QueryCustomerStatusRequestMessage"> <part name="QueryCustomerStatusRequest" element="em:QueryCustomerStatusRequestEM"/> </message> <message name="QueryCustomerStatusResponseMessage"> <part name="QueryCustomerStatusResponse" element="em:QueryCustomerStatusResponseEM"/> </message> <message name="UpdateCustomerRequestMessage"> <part name="UpdateCustomerRequest" element="em:UpdateCustomerRequestEM"/> </message> <message name="UpdateCustomerResponseMessage"> <part name="UpdateCustomerResponse" element="em:UpdateCustomerResponseEM"/> </message> <message name="SyncCustomerRequestMessage"> <part name="SyncCustomerRequest" element="em:SyncCustomerRequestEM"/> </message> <message name="SyncCustomerResponseMessage"> <part name="SyncCustomerResponse" element="em:SyncCustomerResponseEM"/> </message> <portType name="CustomerESCPort"> <operation name="create"> <input message="esc:CreateCustomerRequestMessage"/> <output message="esc:CreateCustomerResponseMessage"/> </operation> <operation name="query"> <input message="esc:QueryCustomerRequestMessage"/> <output message="esc:QueryCustomerResponseMessage"/> </operation> <operation name="queryStatus"> <input message="esc:QueryCustomerStatusRequestMessage"/> <output message="esc:QueryCustomerStatusResponseMessage"/> </operation> <operation name="update"> <input message="esc:UpdateCustomerRequestMessage"/> <output message="esc:UpdateCustomerResponseMessage"/> </operation> <operation name="sync"> <input message="esc:SyncCustomerRequestMessage"/> <output message="esc:SyncCustomerResponseMessage"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="CustomerESCPortBinding" type="esc:CustomerESCPort"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="create"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="query"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="queryStatus"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="update"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="sync"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="CustomerESC"> <port name="CustomerESCPort" binding="esc:CustomerESCPortBinding"> <soap:address location=""/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EM/Parties/Customer/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EM/Parties/Customer/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:eo="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Parties/Customer/V1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EO/Common/V1/CommonComponents.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Parties/Customer/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../EO/Parties/Customer/V1/CustomerEO.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="eo:CustomerEOType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Create Customer Request =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerRequestEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="CreateCustomerRequestDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreateCustomerRequestEM" type="CreateCustomerRequestEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerRequestDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CreateCustomerRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="CustomerEMType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreateCustomerRequest" type="CreateCustomerRequestType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Create Customer Response =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerResponseEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="CreateCustomerResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreateCustomerResponseEM" type="CreateCustomerResponseEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CreateCustomerResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CreateCustomerResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreateCustomerResponse" type="CreateCustomerResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Query Customer Request =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerRequestEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="QueryCustomerRequestDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerRequestEM" type="QueryCustomerRequestEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerRequestDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="QueryCustomerRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerRequest" type="QueryCustomerRequestType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Query Customer Response =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerResponseEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="QueryCustomerResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerResponseEM" type="QueryCustomerResponseEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="QueryCustomerResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerResponse" type="QueryCustomerResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Query Customer Status Request =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusRequestEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="QueryCustomerStatusRequestDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerStatusRequestEM" type="QueryCustomerStatusRequestEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusRequestDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="QueryCustomerStatusRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerStatusRequest" type="QueryCustomerStatusRequestType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Query Customer Status Response =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusResponseEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="QueryCustomerStatusResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerStatusResponseEM" type="QueryCustomerStatusResponseEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="QueryCustomerStatusResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QueryCustomerStatusResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QueryCustomerStatusResponse" type="QueryCustomerStatusResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Update Customer Request =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerRequestEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="UpdateCustomerRequestDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UpdateCustomerRequestEM" type="UpdateCustomerRequestEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerRequestDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="UpdateCustomerRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="CustomerEMType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UpdateCustomerRequest" type="UpdateCustomerRequestType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Update Customer Response =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerResponseEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="UpdateCustomerResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UpdateCustomerResponseEM" type="UpdateCustomerResponseEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="UpdateCustomerResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateCustomerResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UpdateCustomerResponse" type="UpdateCustomerResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Sync Customer Request =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerRequestEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="SyncCustomerRequestDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SyncCustomerRequestEM" type="SyncCustomerRequestEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerRequestDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SyncCustomerRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="CustomerEMType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SyncCustomerRequest" type="SyncCustomerRequestType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============= Sync Customer Response =============--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerResponseEMType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="com:EMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="SyncCustomerResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SyncCustomerResponseEM" type="SyncCustomerResponseEMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SyncCustomerResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SyncCustomerResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="com:Identification" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="com:Status" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SyncCustomerResponse" type="SyncCustomerResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CodeLists.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="Meta.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="IdentificationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Identification" type="com:IdentificationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="StatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="EffectiveDateTime" type="DateTimeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Status" type="StatusType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PreferenceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PriorityRanking" type="NumericType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PreferredIndicator" type="IndicatorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Preference" type="PreferenceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="StopPaymentInstructionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestDateTime" type="DateTimeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ReasonCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ReasonDescription" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="StopPaymentInstruction" type="StopPaymentInstructionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TypeCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FormatCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineOne" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="LineTwo" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="LineThree" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="LineFour" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="CityName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="StateName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="CountyName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PostalCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Preference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Address" type="AddressType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AddressCommunicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Address" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="UseCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Preference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AddressCommunication" type="AddressCommunicationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PhoneCommunicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CompleteNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AreaCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LocalNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="ExtensionNumber" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="UseCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Preference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PhoneCommunication" type="PhoneCommunicationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="EmailCommunicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="URI" type="URIType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="UseCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Preference" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="EmailCommunication" type="EmailCommunicationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ContactType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Contact" type="ContactType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FullName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="FirstName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="MiddleName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="Title" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PersonName" type="PersonNameType"/> <xsd:complexType name="LocationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TypeCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Name" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="Address" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Location" type="LocationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="IdentityDocumentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="NumberID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TypeCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssueDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ExpirationDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingCountryCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingStateCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingLocation" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="IssuingAuthority" type="TextType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="IdentityDocument" type="IdentityDocumentType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BirthDateTime" type="com:DateTimeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BirthCountryCode" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BirthCityName" type="com:NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="PreferredCommunicationLanguageCode" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="GenderCode" type="com:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="IdentityDocument" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Person" type="PersonType"/> <xsd:complexType name="OrganizationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="IncorporationDate" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TypeCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="RegistrationCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Organization" type="OrganizationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PartyType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Person" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Organization" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element ref="Location" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressCommunication" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="PhoneCommunication" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="EmailCommunication" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Party" type="PartyType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonPartyReferenceType" abstract="true"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PersonPartyID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PersonPartyReference" type="PersonPartyReferenceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PartyReferenceType" abstract="true"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OrganizationName" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="PersonName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PartyReference" type="PartyReferenceType"/> <xsd:element name="AccountHolder" type="PartyReferenceType"/> <xsd:complexType name="BankType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BankID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Name" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="SWIFTCode" type="CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Bank" type="BankType"/> <xsd:complexType name="BankBranchType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BankBranchID" type="IdentifierType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Name" type="NameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="BankBranch" type="BankBranchType"/> <xsd:element name="AccountID" type="com:IdentifierType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AccountType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AccountID" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AccountHolder" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Bank" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="BankBranch" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Account" type="AccountType"/> <xsd:element name="PayeeAccount" type="AccountType"/> <xsd:element name="PayFromAccount" type="AccountType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DataTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LanguageCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImplementationCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="BPEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MEDIATOR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BPMN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ESB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other"/> <xsd:enumeration value="JAVA"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortDirectionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LogicalOperatorCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="QueryOperatorCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER_THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER_THAN_EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS_THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS_THAN_EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONTAINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DOES_NOT_CONTAIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LIKE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_LIKE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LIKE_IGNORE_CASE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_LIKE_IGNORE_CASE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_BLANK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_NOT_BLANK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BETWEEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_BETWEEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_IN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResponseCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ID"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OBJECT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CREATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="READ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="READSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SYNC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="STOP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VALIDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BusinessScopeCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DebugLevelCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="None"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Low"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Medium"/> <xsd:enumeration value="High"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SyncActionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="com:StringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CREATEUPDATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CREATEREPLACE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns=" http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1" xmlns:com="http://xmlns.equitybank.co.ke/EnterpriseComponents/EO/Common/V1"> <xsd:complexType name="AmountType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:attribute name="currencyCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BinaryObjectType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:base64Binary"> <xsd:attribute name="mimeCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="characterSetCode" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DateTimeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DurationType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:duration"/>
